mask module¶

mask.py: Mask various patterns for given data.

mask.main()¶
mask.mask(text: str, patterns: List[Tuple[str, Pattern, str]]) → str¶

Mask given patterns by given mask strings.

textstr

Text to process.

patternsList[Tuple[str, Pattern, str]]

List of regex patterns and replacement tokens.

textstr

Processed text.
